processingResourceMetaData.name: JCoRe GNormPlus BioC Reader
processingResourceMetaData.description: This is only a placeholder descriptor. Please use UIMAfit to annotate the component parameters. Then employ the jcore-descriptor-creator's main method to build the descriptor from the reader class GNormPlusFormatMultiplierReader. The jcore-descriptor-creator is already on the classpath as a Maven dependency.
